channel.title: Make a server
channel.description:
A lot of people that read this are going to maybe dislike my idea :S But anyways here what i was thinking
someone should release just a fun staking server and pking
that has many custom rares that not to hard to get but not to easy
with exp rates of like 600x, and many a few rare custom weapons and armor but that are the same as rune and dragon wep power * and defensive power and what not
but anyways i am sure you sorta no what im getting into :)
If someone could make this happen i think the server would make it somewheres :) and make some rsc players happy

item.title: Make a server
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“darscape, post:5, topic:312532”]lol tewl wanted to do this but str0k peekay kept getting distributed denial of service attacked. Now days its just a blank IIS7 installation on a Windows Server 2008 dedicated server. Instead, we were given the sweet, sweet cake of RSCA which, alas, was a lie.

Your best case would be to not involve cake, as this can lead to trouble. Whenever a server gets large enough and fun enough, someone else decides they want the other server’s players and DDoS’s them into oblivion. This is why we cannot have nice things.[/quote]

I was there when Tewl started DDoSing you. He told me to look in your chat box, and once your game went down you told your members to start pinging other servers. You’re nothing but a hypocrite.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a server
item.dc:creator: @Rosebud Rosebud
item.description:
@Rosebud wrote:

I totally agree with you darscape, I truly don’t get the meaning of ddosing its pointless in my eye’s the reason half
the servers get made is because we now a lot people miss rsc and want to get back into it & a lot of people
are also trying to make servers for us, but then u have the people in it just for money.

But anyways what i am getting to is that ddosing is pointless.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a server
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

lol tewl wanted to do this but str0k peekay kept getting distributed denial of service attacked. Now days its just a blank IIS7 installation on a Windows Server 2008 dedicated server. Instead, we were given the sweet, sweet cake of RSCA which, alas, was a lie.

Your best case would be to not involve cake, as this can lead to trouble. Whenever a server gets large enough and fun enough, someone else decides they want the other server’s players and DDoS’s them into oblivion. This is why we cannot have nice things.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a server
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

isn’t there one? there has been but they all failed and had to close thought

Read full topic

item.title: Make a server
item.dc:creator: @iamthemaster iamthemaster
item.description:
@iamthemaster wrote:

Yup I agree miles id definitely subscribe or something if that happened. I dont like custom rares or custom armour but I think a good pking and staking server is needed. perhaps another control panel one

Read full topic

item.title: Make a server
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

IMO; xEnt, Stork, and someone with a lot of money - should all hook up and make the best pking server that’s as close to RSC as possible. I’m sick of PKing on all these servers that are just fucked. The combat system is a big problem in almost every server, then the random walkbacks/lagg. It’s getting ridiculousssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss

P.S. - DO IT

Read full topic
